thread.title: Lackey dominates, Cardinals beat Cubs 4-0 in NLDS opener
thread.title_full: Lackey dominates, Cardinals beat Cubs 4-0 in NLDS opener

title: Lackey dominates, Cardinals beat Cubs 4-0 in NLDS opener
text:
> Sports Lackey dominates, Cardinals beat Cubs 4-0 in NLDS opener Chicago Cubs' Chris Coghlan (8) talks with umpire Phil Cuzzi after Coghlan struck out during the second inning of Game 1 in baseball's National League Division Series against the St. Louis Cardinals, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015, in St. Louis. (AP Photo/Charles Rex Arbogast) Search Help
